Foxfingers cocked his head slightly. A Predacon with honor and a conscience
seemed to be to much to hope for. She wanted the truth but he didn't know if
thw truth was very believable. "Would you believe that I'm a genetic currier
for a scientist who has the ability to change translife as we know it adn
end all the wars?" Not even he believed it and he knew that it was true.

Foxfingers heard the mention of Megatron. This was bad news. Foxfingers knew
something big was happening if Megatron was involved. On the other hand this
could be a blessing from the Matrix. Whatever Megatron turned into had to be
very powerful. Veratis would want a sample.
----- Original Message -----
From: <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, October 31, 2000 9:56 AM
Subject: Re: Foxfingers


> ::KitKat::
>
> She chuckled. "Yes, a teacher with a nack for sneaking around. Now
> please. Tell me why you are here.  I believe it would be the
> honorable thing to simply tell the truth.  Tell me, and I shall let
> you go. No harm.  I swear this to you. I have seen enough Mech fluid
> shed to last 20 life times."
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > The small foxbot looked back and fourth between Drillbit and
> > KitKat, "I don't suppose you'd believe that I just happened to be
> in
> > the neighborhood and thought I'd stop by?" he knew they wouldn't
> > believe it. "How about I was thinking about buying a ship like this
> > and wanted to test the legroom." That wouldn't go over to well. He
> > didn't know what to say. he couldn't use the truth
> >
> >  he thought about the truth "I was on my hoverboard on my way back
> to
> > veratis with the stolen DNA from various maximals and decided to
> stop
> > by and see what I could steel frim you. He'd only say that if he
> > wanted to commit suicide.
> >
> > He decided to try to change the subject again. "Do any of us truly
> > know why we're here?" Isn't that the mysterie of the universe?" he
> > sat forward looking at his two hosts eye to eye "If I had the
> answer
> > to that I wouldn't have to be on this planet. I'd be teaching the
> > laws of Physics at an acadamy somewhere."
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > > ::KitKat:;
> > >
> > > She smiled and sat down. She heard his comments and smiles. Only
> > > fools talk about sports and the weather. She smiled,"Now then,
> > would
> > > you be so kind as to tell me why you decided to walk in here and
> > not
> > > announce yourself?"
> > >
> > >
> > > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > > > KitKat said no harm would come to Foxfingers and when she
> stopped
> > > > Drillbit he was beginning to believe her. Usually when A
> predacon
> > > > wants to sit and talk it's so reinforcements could arrive. He
> was
> > > > outnumbered 2 to 1 and still standing. he walked over to where
> > > kitKat
> > > > was and sat. "OK what would you like to talk about? I know how
> > bout
> > > > the sintronic cybers Cyberball team I think they could go all
> the
> > > way
> > > > this year." he was being a smartalec but he had to try to keep
> > them
> > > > off gaurd as long as he could.
> > > >
>
